bibl.title: De Cephisophonte verna, ut perhibent, Euripidis. [En anglais.]
bibl.note: The story in Satyrus (ed. Arrighetti, fr. 39 XII and XIII), which seems to make Euripides swap wives with Cephisophon, has been misunderstood by modern interpreters.
bibl.seg: KOVACS David, De Cephisophonte verna, ut perhibent, Euripidis. [En anglais.]
The story in Satyrus (ed. Arrighetti, fr. 39 XII and XIII), which seems to make Euripides swap wives with Cephisophon, has been misunderstood by modern interpreters.
